resources.string: The synchronization of external accounts with ActivA network is an optional proccess, although it will help you to improve your experience at future versions. If you want to skip this process, press the OK button or close the windown by pressing BACK mobile button.
Welcome to ActivA application. Before starting to use the application, you must first create an ActivA account or enter an existed one
In order to make you easier to use the application at following times without losing security, it\'s required to enter a password pattern which will be asked every time you start the application.
For coming back to the environment, press BACK button

Welcome to ActivaCentral.

Slice the finger over the screen for moving on the environment and press over the highlighted areas for zoom in to the different widgets of the room.

Once zoomed in, press over the widgets for accessing their functionalities, keep pressed for changing their functionality or press the return button for coming back to the room.

Enjoy ActivaCentral

string-array.name: usertypewarn
string-array.item: Enter your patient environmet and you’ll discover a new way to manage your personal and medical information or how to take control over you illness. Reach your doctor with a single mouse click! And if you want to go mobile… Do so!

Enter clinicians environment and you’ll be able to set up your own virtual office. Manage your patients, stay in touch with researchers and get the latest academic information you need to stay updated.
Speed up your research with datasets and access to powerful tools.
